titleStmt.title: Queen Esthers resolves: or, A princely pattern of heaven-born resolution, for all the lovers of God and their country: opened in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, at the monethly fast, May 27, 1646. / By Richard Heyricke, Warden of Christs Colledge in Manchester in Lancashire, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Heyrick, Richard, 1600-1667.

titleStmt.title: Queen Esthers resolves: or, A princely pattern of heaven-born resolution, for all the lovers of God and their country: opened in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, at the monethly fast, May 27, 1646. / By Richard Heyricke, Warden of Christs Colledge in Manchester in Lancashire, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Heyrick, Richard, 1600-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for Luke Favvne, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
